title: Count vowels in a string
solution: function countVowels(s){const v=new Set(['a','e','i','o','u']);let c=0;for(const ch of s.toLowerCase()) if(v.has(ch)) c++;return c;}

title: Reverse string
solution: function reverseString(s){let r='';for(let i=s.length-1;i>=0;i--) r+=s[i];return r;}

title: Remove duplicates (preserve order)
solution: function unique(arr){const s=new Set();const r=[];for(const x of arr) if(!s.has(x)){s.add(x);r.push(x);}return r;}
